transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ah sir, naan Swathi call pannitu pesuringa IndiaMART-indhirundhu.
Customer: Ah sollunga.
Executive: 15 days follow up conversation sir idhu. Ah sir, naan 15 days kekuringala sir naan pesuradhu?
Customer: Sollunga madam.
Executive: Sir naan unga kitta naan 15 days appuram oru call connect pandra maari irukkunnu sollirundhen sir preference check panna.
Customer: Aama aama madam.
Executive: So andha call naan ippo connect pannikalaangala sir?
Customer: Sollunga madam.
Executive: Appadingala ok sir, naan ippo connect pandradhu kooda thaan, naalaki address-um change aagum, adhe maari namma catalog-ume update panna mudiyum. Yenna naan madam-ukku call pannumbodhu ungala reach panna sollirundhaanga sir naan adhai kekkaren.
Customer: Seri madam. Illa madam naalaki avangala call panni sollunga madam.
Executive: Naalaikkingala? Innaikku edhaavadhu possible irukka sir ungakku evening-la?
Customer: Hospital-la irukken madam, konjam family members-kku fever-unnu sollittu hospital-la irukken madam.
Executive: Madam unga family-la konjam fever-unnu sollittu ellaarume hospital-la irukkaanga madam.
Customer: Oh ok ok puriyudhu puriyudhu puriyudhu.
Customer: Naalaikku naan call pannittu call panna correct-aa irukkum sir namma.
Customer: Naan vandhuttu ungakku call pannaren madam.
Executive: Seri ok konjam marakkaama call pannunga appodhaan adhai update panna mudiyum sir.
Customer: Adhu innamaa maathiningala madam?
Executive: Innum konjam change aayidichu but neenga naalaikku connect pandradhu-la thaan live aagum sir idhu.
Executive: Ennoda end-la naan change pannitten.
Customer: Adhu serious koduthaa udane pannittaanga sollittu varadhu call connect panna sollunga.
Executive: Change aayidichu sir.
Customer: Adhu maaridichu-la.
Executive: Ah maaridichu-la sir adhu change aayidichu.
Customer: Seri. Indha preference-kku thaan naan ungakku andha 15 days appuram call connect panna sonnadhu. Idhai naan madam-kitte-yume ippo inform pannirundhen staff thaan idhai paathuttu irukkaanga manager thaan paakraanga appadinnu sollirundhaanga. So andha condition-naala thaan namma ungakku idhu call pannirundhinga sir.
Customer: Ok ok madam illa illa madam idhu naalaikku vandhuttu call pannunga madam idhu idhu-la irundhu naan poi vararen.
Executive: Ah seri ok neenga call pannunga seri ok madam.
Executive: Ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to connect for preference check.

Resolution:

- Customer is in hospital due to family illness.
- Executive agreed to call back tomorrow.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back tomorrow.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- preference, follow up, catalog update
